TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITable implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Linq.IQueryable

Docs.summary: Used for weakly typed query scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about methods, see <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601>.

Docs.summary: Allows deserialized entities to be associated with a new instance of a so that they can be updated or deleted from the database.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about how to use this method, see [Data Retrieval and CUD Operations in N-Tier Applications (LINQ to SQL)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/data-retrieval-and-cud-operations-in-n-tier-applications.md).
If a required member is missing, a <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictException> is thrown during <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.SubmitChanges%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeleteAllOnSubmit (System.Collections.IEnumerable entities);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeleteAllOnSubmit(class System.Collections.IEnumerable entities) cil managed

Docs.param: The collection from which all items are removed.
Docs.summary: Puts all entities from the collection into a state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Call <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.SubmitChanges%2A> to perform the actual deletion in the database.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeleteOnSubmit (object entity);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeleteOnSubmit(object entity) cil managed

Docs.summary: Puts an entity from this table into a state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Disconnected entities must be attached before they can be deleted. Call <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.SubmitChanges%2A> to perform the actual deletion in the database.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Data.Linq.ModifiedMemberInfo[] GetModifiedMembers (object entity);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Data.Linq.ModifiedMemberInfo[] GetModifiedMembers(object entity) cil managed

Docs.param: The entity from which to get the array.
Docs.summary: Returns an array of modified members that contain their current and original values.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetOriginalEntityState (object entity);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetOriginalEntityState(object entity) cil managed

Docs.param: The entity whose original value is to be retrieved.
Docs.returns: A copy of the original entity. The value is null if the entity passed in is not tracked. Disconnected entities sent back by a client must be attached before the can begin to track their state. The "original state" of a newly attached entity is established based on values supplied by the client. The data context does not track the state of disconnected entities.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Note the following:
- The entity argument must be non-null. Otherwise, a null argument exception is thrown.
- In the case of the strongly typed (`TEntity`) method, the type must be mapped and must be an entity type. That is, it must have object ID information in its mapping. Otherwise, a wrong type exception is thrown.
